pages.text: $(9)Armor Toughness$() is a stat that reduces the effectiveness of incoming armor reduction.$(p)Usually provided by armor items or shields.

Each point of Armor Toughness reduces the effectiveness of Armor Pierce and Armor Shred by 2%, up to 60%.$(p)This function is unique to Apotheosis. In Vanilla Minecraft, Armor Toughness contributes to damage reduction.
